website_summaries.verdict: The holes in this basket are punched from the inside out, so your food doesn't have sharp edges for snagging.
pros: Great for shrimp, vegetables and diced meat
Holes punched from the inside out so food doesn't snag
Large enough that food stays in, even if you stir it
cons: Edges may be sharp, so consider using mitts – especially if it's hot from the grill

customer_reviews.title: Does the job- NOT made in the USA, though
customer_reviews.text: The product is a good weight and feels solid. It certainly cooks our vegetables well. However, I ordered this basket because I was under the impression that it was made in the USA (based on some other reviews and answers in the FAQ section on Amazon). To be fair, the Grillaholics website does not state that it is made in the USA (although I could have sworn that I read it somewhere during the research process for this basket...) I want to clarify to others who may be interested in buying this that IT IS MADE IN CHINA. Hopefully others won't be confused like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I grill ALOT. I love grilling vegtables and seafood yet the food would always stick or fall through the grates. This basket has been amazing and will be used multiple times a week!. I made shrimp in it and they finally turned out perfectly. The baskwt is sturdy, so theres no issue with how much I put in it. I'll be grilling some Salmon in it tomorrow. I love how I can cook enough for a few days worth on it if I need to!
customer_reviews.author: Disney Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I wanted to start grilling more vegetables and it does a fantastic job of this. I've used it dozens of times now and I wonder how I got by without it. Wait, I know how I use to get by, I wrapped them in foil and dropped them on the grill and let them cook blindly. I've had so much more success in getting the perfect level of grilling in asparagus, zucchini, and others now that I can see them cooking. If you grill vegetables at all, this is a must have product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this during the grilling season!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in a variety of ways. First, we use it for small items that would normally fall through like asparagus or green beans. We've also used this for meats as well, like scallops so you don't have to worry about them falling through either. The best way we love to use this is to make a packet with foil and then we have fresh grilled delicious food without a cleanup hassle. We will continue to use this when its warmer :) Great Product, not a sponsored review, just really like the design.
customer_reviews.author: RealReviewer

customer_reviews.title: True stainless steel perfection.
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several before choosing this one. I wanted real stainless steel (not chrome) and heavy weight. Size is large enough to cook for 4 with room to properly stir, heavy enough to prevent warping. Afterwards, clean up was easy using Barkeepers Friend, just like All Clad pans. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: WWWWoodchuck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grilled veggies!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this grill basket for my boyfriend that loves to cook on the grill, we eat a lot of meat and wanted to add more veggies in to our diet. This grill basket is well made, heavy duty stainless steel and a large size to add lots of extra veggies (It cooks evenly and thoroughly so you get the best veggies in every bite we will be using this basket all the time. I highly recommend this grill basket to anyone who likes grilling and loves veggies!
customer_reviews.author: jill leech

customer_reviews.title: Switch to zip ties
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the tacky substance on the label, it felt like it was super glued onto the item which took me about 5 minutes or more to take off, I wasn’t timing myself, but it took a long time. After cleaning it you can still see some residue. I let them know. Only issue I had with it, why I have it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rodo

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy our veggies grilled and this works great. The only disappointment is that since it's stainless steel I thought it should be easier to clean. Since it's used on the grill it does tend to get charred in places.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaB

customer_reviews.title: Half, .5, 50%, .500, ...
customer_reviews.text: Those are great stats in some things in life, but in a product that has four corners and half them aren't attached...not great. I read the bad reviews but bought off on the "new & improved" marketing. Don't do it!!! They didn't fix anything on the manufacturing side, this basket is still as faulty as ever.
customer_reviews.author: sumdumguy

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, needs quality control
customer_reviews.text: This basket is a great size, weight and design. The only problem is they apparently have some manufacturing quality control issues. Like others who have reviewed this basket, mine arrived with one corner not welded. The other three are sturdy enough to keep it solid, so I'm keeping it. But hey Grillaholics...get that quality control under control!
customer_reviews.author: ChChCheddar

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Corner bracket was not welded. You can either return the basket and order from a different manufacturer or weld it yourself if you have a welder... Follow up - I just received my replacement from Amazon and IT IS DEFECTIVE IN THE SAME PLACE! Save yourself some grief and DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding veggies on the grill.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur backyard griller but I have a few years (decades) behind a grill. I was able to put some asparagus in with avocado oil drizzled on and they grilled up perfectly in the basket. I've only used it a few times so far but it cleans up easily and is solidly built. I like that it has holes all around for smoking items and letting the air travel all around the veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, generously sized
customer_reviews.text: This basket replaces an unwieldy clamshell wire grid. It's a bit wider than one half the width of my little two-burner CharBroil infrared grill. It's totally easy to toss cubed veggies, and one day I'll experiment with similarly cut meat and maybe fishes—the latter requiring, I anticipate, some delicate handling and lower temps. I've used this once so far, at the very high heat I use for the first segment of "flash" grilling turkey thighs. Its thick walls get very hot so make sure you use quality, thick mitts when handling it. The sloping sides make tossing cubed food easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Windrum

customer_reviews.title: I have used many grill baskets and I have not loved them as much I I love this one
customer_reviews.text: We are huge grillers in my house! I have used many grill baskets and I have not loved them as much I I love this one. My veggies were perfectly cooked; still a bit crispy with that great “grill” taste. I have also cooked salmon in it and it didn’t fall apart or over cook. This basket is built for veggies and fish to perfection! It’s also a really great size, not too big that it’s the only thing on the grill and not too small that you can’t cook a sufficient amount of food in it! It’s also incredibly easy to clean! Love this and highly recommend! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Bakergirl

customer_reviews.title: A very solid grill basket
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how many grill baskets I've destroyed before buying the Grillaholics, but I don't see needing to replace this guy for a very, very long time. This thing is solid! The stainless sheet they used is 1/16" thick, and has welded reinforcements on the upper corners. The edges of the handles are smooth, so no worries about metal slivers or anything else. I use this on a pellet grill, and the number and size of the holes has a positive effect on adding smoke flavor to food, while still protecting the food from getting burnt. At this price, for as sturdy as it is, I just can't see finding anything better. My
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Good Quality. Solidly Made.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this basket. It’s solidly made. It’s easy to clean and goes in the dishwasher. It cooked my veggies to perfection. The holes are big enough to allow a little bit of flame through to give the vegetables a slight char which I like. I was concerned about the construction as some had issues with grill baskets in general. Mine came beautifully constructed. The label came off easily and left no marks. I consider this an essential grill item. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LL Cool Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great for Potatoes and Vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Our basket arrived in perfect condition. We have used it 3 times since receiving it. We have grilled asparagus as well as potatoes. It may seem weird, but we grilled tater tots tossed in some olive oil and salt. They were the crispiest and best tasting tater tots we have ever had. They made a great side dish for the hamburgers we were grilling. While the grill basket cleans well, it does discolor somewhat upon using it. The color doesn't bother me as the basket is clean. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great food, but very difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a good basket. Grilling in this is very simple, and food turns out well. With that being said, it is VERY difficult to clean afterwards. Oil quickly bakes onto this and even after soaking, you need to use bartenders friend and a brillo pad to get it clean again. If you do not care about it looking clean, then definitely purchase. If you are OCD about cleanliness, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrewloves_

customer_reviews.title: Goodness on the Grill
customer_reviews.text: We like this item very much. We have used it twice for grilling vegitables on a gas grill. Both times we cut up the vegies an tossed them with olive oil with garlic and put them on the grill while our meat was cooking. The results were quite tasty. Afterwards cleanup is no problem. We just put it in the dishwasher with everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful grill basket!
customer_reviews.text: I cook on the grill as much as possible in the summer. I love this basket. It cooks the food evenly, doesn't drop any morsels into the flames. My only complaint is that I had to soak this overnight and then scrub (and scrub and scrub) with Bar Keeper's Friend to get the veggie gunk off the basket. I don't have steel wool, so added that to my grocery list, and hopefully that will reduce the scrubbing involved after cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Handy basket for smaller items. All the edges are quite sharp, I don't carelessly handle it, will be sanding them down
customer_reviews.author: C. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Poor welding!!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Believe the negative reviews. First one came with three welded corners broken and one corner with a long hair stuck stuck in between. Sent it to be replaced and received another which had one welded corner that had broken off. I will be keeping this one as I don’t want to send it in again but bad quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Razo

customer_reviews.title: Heat it up
customer_reviews.text: The grill basket arrived very quickly and as a plus, the manufacturer reached out proactively. This basket is made of a heavy gauge steel as noted by other reviewers and has been manufactured very well - no burrs or sharp edges. I used it it to roast fingerling potatoes directly on my pellet grill - worked like a champ! As a bonus, I simply rinsed it off and put it in the dishwasher and it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Solid but broken, great smoky flavor off our Traeger though!
customer_reviews.text: We knew we wanted a grill basket for our Traeger, and the asparagus we made in it turned out AMAZING, but the basket itself arrived broken. I’ve included a picture of each of the four corners. One out of four supports is in good shape. Two are attached on only one side, and the fourth one was broke off in the box. The basket will hopefully hold up fine without any of them, but these corner pieces just make the basket seem cheaplyadr.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill basket
customer_reviews.text: Nice, high-quality grill basket. I use Bar Keepers Friend, which makes it easy to clean, although sometimes the strength of Comet is needed to remove baked on olive oil. The sides are nice and high so that my veggies don't slide out when I flip or stir them. I'd definitely buy again (not that I'd need to; I suspect this will last the rest of my life) and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: eajking

customer_reviews.title: works well if you don't want to use a coated grill pan
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the first time to grill shrimp with peppers. We had to break dinner up into two batches so as not to overcrowd the grill pan. Food turned out great, easy to use, and relatively easy to clean. Will update review after a month or so to see how it holds up with frequent use. But it appears to be sturdy and well constructed, and good for grilled vegetables, fish, or fajitas.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to grill veggies
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of these baskets I have owned. The first I gave to a friend when we moved and I had to immediately get another come grilling season. While it is not the easiest to clean sometimes, that has to do with marinade and veggies, not design of the basket. I highly recommend the Grillaholics basket for function, durability and best way ever to cook all kinds of vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska the 49th State

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Stainless gill basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is the real deal, heavyweight stainless, just PERFECT. My old grill basked was "non-stick" which meant that after one use the coating was scratched and peeled...yuck. This Basket is not coated so just use a little light oil if you you are afraid of "sticking". After some tirals, I decided that grilling without oil worked great, just like when you grill directly on the grates. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Kuntzelman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty grill basket
customer_reviews.text: Thiis basket is a lot heavier and better quality than most of the others that I have looked at. Heavy duty stainless steel, perfect size and a great design. I used it earlier tonight for some fresh cut vegetables to go along with my grilled steak. It keeps everything close and conducts heat evenly. This is perfect for everyday use or even if you only occasionally cook on the grill. For the price and great quality it can’t be beat
customer_reviews.author: Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity, Even cooking, Must have grill accessory!!
customer_reviews.text: This Grill Basket is a great price and a great buy. It is very good quality and sturdy. It has a good depth which is perfect for grilling just about anything. It is spacious and has a good size bottom that will allow grilling to be even and thorough. It won’t char certain pieces and leave others uncooked. It’s heavy enough to be a quality grill basket without it being too heavy once it’s loaded up. I would definitely recommend this basket for anyone with a grill, whether it’s seasoned grill pros or first time grillers.
customer_reviews.author: CatM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and made some great veggies
customer_reviews.text: I got to use this for the first time last night and tossed some chopped up peppers, mushrooms, asparagus, broccoli and brussels in a ziplock bag with olive oil, salt and some balsamic vinegar, let them sit over night and then dumped them into the basket and threw it on the kettle grill. Results were outstanding. Get them HOT for those nice grill marks.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Lankford

customer_reviews.title: Oil veggies do not stick.
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. It fits on my Grill with the grill cover completely closed unlike grill baskets with fixed handles. It handled two cut up zucchini squash, 3 large bell peppers 1 larger purple onion and two std boxes of portabella mushrooms with room to spare. The veggies with some oil and balsamic vinegar cooked nicely without sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Craig johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but check your grill's size
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is easy to use, easy to clean, and holds a ton of product. Walls are good size to keep everything in. Handles make it easy to lift and manipulate. My only warning is to check the size of your grill. I have a 22" kettle grill, and if I had anything even a little bit smaller, this basket would be too large. Right now, I can just squeeze the grill basket over one half of the grill for a two-zone fire.
customer_reviews.author: A/M

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy basket
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for a friend, so I don't know how it will holdup, but it seems to be a high quality, sturdy stainless steel pan. While the outside dimensions are 12x12, the inside dimensions are 81/2x81/2, but the size looks adequate for a good amount of vegetables. The depth appears to be high enough to keep the food in while stirring!
customer_reviews.author: Karla with a K

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling tool!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time yesterday for a family celebration. I grilled loads of meat and veggies. They were delicious! And so easy. I don’t know why I haven’t purchased a basket before now! So much better than skewers that burn in two or gett so hot you can’t get the food off of them! This is my new favorite grilling tool!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Triple Reinforced Corners?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is meant by “triple reinforced” corners. I assumed that the sides overlapped in addition to the welded tab adjoining each corner as one might conclude from the photo associated with this claim. Not the case. The corners are slotted with welded tabs adjoining each corner similar to the construction of most other grill baskets. The metal is fairly heavy gauge, however which was another selling point for me. This being my first grill basket, it is a vast improvement over not having one.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Roggenkamp

customer_reviews.title: This is a great heavy duty basket
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket is nice and thick - heavy duty with plenty of space for veggies and such. Of course you can grill vegetables on the grill with it - and it is great at that. But we also use it when we don't have small things to grill as a tray to carry things in and out from fridge to grill and grill to table. Very handy - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Horn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grill Basket
customer_reviews.text: Used this to smoke some shrimp . Worked absolutely fantastic. Clean up was a breeze. Can't wait to use this for veggies next. Highly endorse and recommend. Only issue with cleaning is actually a positive. All the little holes make it tough to get perfectly clean at first. (I was using a dishwashing soap brush). As soon as i got my normal sponge out it was perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: zach thomas

customer_reviews.title: just good 'ole stainless steel doing what it does
customer_reviews.text: Problem solved! No more veggies sliding of into the fires and the sides are searing the contents too. No flimsy handles with rivets...just good 'ole stainless steel doing what it does. I love it...and have been using it every weekend since it was delivered. This is my 3rd try and I have found a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling basket - must have for grilling enthusiests!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and is just perfect for quickly and efficiently grilling chopped up veggies on the grill. Has not warped even with relatively high heat. This basket gives cooking effect of skewering veggies but without the hassle. I use a soft scrubbing pad for quick cleanup in the sink when done. I waited way too long to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kowaleski

customer_reviews.title: Love cooking veggies in this
customer_reviews.text: My favorite grill food is veggie skewers but it takes so much time to assemble. I love that I can throw the chopped veggies in this basket and get the same delicious taste as if they were directly on the grill. It's super easy to clean, I've even thrown it in the dishwasher a few times and it's held up great.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla P.

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and solid
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this product and have not yet gotten a chance to use it. At first glance it appears to be sturdy, well made and of good quality. The real test will come once used obviously. The last one I had was powder coated and did not hold up well to heat and pretty limited use. It was difficult to clean and ended up rusting. I should not have that issue with this one given that it is stainless steel. I will update this review after use.
customer_reviews.author: stephen christie

customer_reviews.title: Works well grilling vegetables
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to use and clean then getting foil, spraying it with non-stick, and getting it on a hot BBQ. Surprisingly it cleans pretty well. Often things in the BBQ get the black marks that are hard to get off. This does get it a bit but it easily comes off. Fit plenty of veggies in here for many people.
customer_reviews.author: Skillz194

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to roast vegetables on the grill rather than heat up the house with my oven. I was able to cook steaks on one side of my grill with this basket full of vegetables on the other side. It was easy and delicious. I will definitely be using the grill basket often.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! I use it to grill veggies in the summer to keep the heat out of the house. I’ve also found it works well flipped over to promote airflow around my oven roasts. It’s easier to clean than the grate I’d originally bought for that purpose. If I could give six stars to Grillaholics’ customer service, I would. I had a problem with my product, and they were very quick to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Home Improver

customer_reviews.title: For People who hate using skewers to grill
customer_reviews.text: Just used it today....only thng I grilled were vegetables lots of them... When it was done.. Delicious.. The wife was really impressed.. The ease of it... To easy.. Just Remember to have your oven mitts or grill gloves.. Super hot to touch...
customer_reviews.author: dresden67

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this grill basket primarily for vegetables. I use a Weber Spirit grill with three burners and place the basket directly in the middle with the gas on high. I have tried asparagus and twice zucchini, having left the basket over the burners to heat up for about five minutes before I started. It takes forever and there are no grill marks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If a product could have 6 stars, I would rate it 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: I like veggies on the grill in the summer. Skewers are a hassle. Now I have veggies twice a week and this basket is terrific. I have had company over about 4 times and used the basket and now they are getting the basket for themselves. I use Good Seasoning Italian salad dressing, 1 packet, with extra virgin olive oil. This basket makes it so easy and clean up is a snap if you spray, lightly, with PAM before putting the veggies in the basket. Even kids will eat their veggies if you grill using this basket. Red potatoes are also very good using this same recipe. Boil potatoes a little to cut down on grill time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Roe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem very sturdy - shipped w/ one corner broken
customer_reviews.text: When I received this, one of the corners was broken revealing sharp edges. It appears over time the other corners will do the same thing. Cheaply made...I would consider a basket that doesn't have corners sealed with riveted brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Gary V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basket for the Grill
customer_reviews.text: I have used many baskets. The food in this grilled evenly and the clean up was easy. I love that it is stainless steel. It is also a heavy gauge which makes it a very solid product It conducts the heat well. I used if for the first time last night and want to buy another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Y. Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Save the veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was tired of having my vegetables when grilling drop into the flame to never be seen again and it was a great buy! My vegetables are grilled to perfection and I am not losing any of them. The basket is well made and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vackner

customer_reviews.title: Great for tossing seafood
customer_reviews.text: First thought was shrimp and scallops, and it works exactly as I hoped. Marinated them for awhile, popped them in the basket and tossed them around as they grilled. Basket is big enough and walls tall enough that nothing escaped. Everyone else has already noted the quality, so I'll just leave it at love.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mulligan

customer_reviews.title: More veggies, please
customer_reviews.text: Rather than spending half an hour skewering everything small, or making a flimsy foil packet, now I toss my smaller grillables into this basket, stir every so often, and we're cooked. I'm cooking so many more vegetables more. It's not the easiest to clean charred remnants off of, but that's also the nature of charred remnants.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Simple but amazing product !
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket is so easy to use. I mainly use it for veggies, since it allows me to cut up veggies that typically take long to grill (like potatoes, sweet potatoes, Eggplant and butternut squash) much smaller to reduce cook time. I somerimws toss shrimp. steak or chicken in basket with veggies and make a type of smoky fajitas. I will never again hassle with skewers now or worry about veggies falling thru grate. Lastly, Often pile the veggies high in basket and simply toss periodically to make sure everything cooks evenly
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Bono

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Best invention!
customer_reviews.text: I love grilling out all year round! I seen this and thought it would make my life so much easier trying to cook veggies especially in the winter and boy was I right! It saves so much time and it easy to clean up. Its heavy duty, very nice! I need more of these! Reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Meade

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny for well-built product with Lifetime guarantee!
customer_reviews.text: I FINALLY found a grill basket worth something! This is very sturdy, heavy, well-built with reinforcements around the corners to prevent them from separating. I love that this is stainless steel and I don't have to worry about getting any of the non-stick coating in my food as with some of the other baskets I've purchased. Can't wait to enjoy some veggies on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: #mommyofblondies

customer_reviews.title: Nice size!
customer_reviews.text: This a gift for our kids, so we have not used it personally. However, being the owner of other grill baskets, I love the size of the bottom of this basket. It provides more space for the vegetables to be over the heat, not bunched up on the sides. The basket feel very sturdy. I have not cleaned it, but it does not appear that it would be a bother. Simple soap and a brush or steel wool if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica T

customer_reviews.title: An essential item for those who grill their food.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for those who use their grill more that the kitchen stove! I made Korean Beef (Bulgogi) using the grill basket over my green egg the day I received it. The holes are the prefect size to allow plenty of heat and smoke(if you use hickory or mesquite chips).
customer_reviews.author: Aikiguy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for grilling veggies
customer_reviews.text: Great veggie grilling basket. Well made and appears that it will last years. Two very minor critiques: first, I wish it was a little larger so I could grill more veggies. Second, it can be a pain to clean. But clean grill equipment is rarely used grill equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/ Great service support
customer_reviews.text: This grilling basket was exactly what I needed for my stir fry vegetables. The basket is sturdy and holds up excellently to the heat of a grill. Very high quality and great value for the money. Incredible service support as well from the Grillaholics support team!
customer_reviews.author: Trey  Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Grillaholics Grill Basket just in time for baseball season
customer_reviews.text: It is ideal for grilling any kind of vegetables such as onions, potatoes, peppers, tomatoes, mushrooms, and much more. Its grill holes are big enough to prevent vegetables from falling down by releasing proper heat to cook the vegetables instead. It is made from stainless steel, and is dishwasher safe. It is easy to carry as well since it has been equipped with stainless steel handles. I can't wait to use this at my next tailgate Go Brewers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grilled Veggies
customer_reviews.text: I love that these grill baskets are USA made by a small company. We need to support our small USA companies. The 2 grill baskets that I purchased were made of heavyweight steel that were put together to last. The baskets were the perfect size for grilling broccoli and asparagus. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality grill basket
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this grill basket and will be using it soon for both my Weber grill and my new Smoker. I'm sure it will become one of my favorite grill/smoker accessories. It really hasn't been outdoor cooking weather here in Illinois this winter. Spring is coming!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Gnome

customer_reviews.title: Bad Welds
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned to due faulty welds, did not get to use
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: The grill basket is bigger than expected and is very sturdy but it is hard to clean. Be sure and use extra thick pot holders as it gets quite hot. Glad I didn't get 2.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift, and was more then happy with Grill Basket. A well built item not a cheep knock off. I have an old one and it is well used but when I do replace it, this is the one I will order. EPG
customer_reviews.author: phil grier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill basket
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent grill basket. Holes in basket are appropriately sized so that food does not slip through yet allows for great contact with the grill. Holds a lot of vegetables. Very sturdy and easy to clean. I highly recommend this basket!
customer_reviews.author: Keith T.

customer_reviews.title: Tank you for another fine prodocts
customer_reviews.text: These are most useful for fish and vegetables few years Back purchased 2 for gifts so now time to get my grill master one. For us love.the tips and reiepted also Besides you product s I can get tips and rex
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: Great basket very strong
customer_reviews.text: I use it for potatoes, fish, Shrimp and veggies. Great tool for grilling
customer_reviews.author: Joan Marinaro

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this grill basket
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this grill basket, other baskets I have had have handles which have made it hard to close the grill. the Grill Basket fits in my grill perfect allowing me to close the grill completely getting a better grill on my vegetables. The basket is also nice and deep allowing me to add a large amount of vegetables at one time. The heavier stainless steal material is very durable and dishwasher safe making cleaning so much easier. Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he loves grilling vegetables. I thought it would be great! Well, we have already tossed it because it burned the food so terribly Nd it was missing “brackets” on two sides. Very cheaply made! Extremely disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nicely

customer_reviews.title: Broken corner welds
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two and both had broken corner welds (one corner missing the metal tab that was supposed to hold it together). Too bad, I was really looking forward to using these after reading the great reviews, but I'll look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jcole

customer_reviews.title: Great quality grill baskets at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I will echo a lot of what other people have already stated about these grill baskets. These baskets are very good quality and have made grilling vegetables much easier than trying to form flimsy aluminum foil into a pan. They are made of thick stainless steel with attention to detail. So far we have done squash, potatoes and onions and they all turned out perfect. The stainless steel was a breeze to clean. We try to do as much grilling in the summer months to keep the house cooler and these have definetly made cooking vegetables much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler G Solberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy Clean Heavy Duty!
customer_reviews.text: When this item first arrived I was pleasantly surprised at the weight! This grill basket is heavy duty and the perfect size for tossing potatos, veggies, etc. on the grill! I rubbed olive oil on it before grilling and it was easy to clean when finished. I give this basket a double thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Saree

customer_reviews.title: Grillaholics Are On Fire - In The Best Way
customer_reviews.text: We received our grill basket from Grillaholics on time and in excellent condition. Diced peppers were immediately on the grill and absolutely none fell to the flames. Really substantial and excellent quality, unlike many we've seen in stores. Then, we received what sure felt like a personalized email to be sure we were completely happy. We're very happy grillers now. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie L. Fry

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and it’s capacity to hold large number of vegetables that I like using it for. Plenty of vents in the basket to allow the heat and flto allow for char to form on veggies to bring out flavor. It also is quite sturdy. Doesn’t break down with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: jason g

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love to grill and especially grill veggies and this makes it soooo much easier, doesn’t burn my veggies and they don’t fall through. I love it! I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice
customer_reviews.text: Our last grill basket wasn’t stainless and rusted. We will never have to worry about this one. The basket is well made and looks nice...good size for cooking for the family on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: B. Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid grill basket, seems like it will last for many years to come. If you’re familiar with these you know cleaning is all dependent on what and how you’re cooking. Scrub pads do the job.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Its been easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use it for grilling vegetables on an outdoor gas grill. Normally I will have coated my veggies with olive oil before grilling, this tends to discolor the surface after use but I was expecting that. Its been easy to clean. Normally I use a Scotch Brite scour pad briefly and then stick it in the dishwasher. Being made of a heavy gauge of stainless steel I anticipate many years of trouble free use.
customer_reviews.author: David W Hopewell DDS

customer_reviews.title: really good product priced great
customer_reviews.text: this is great to cook smaller foods on the grill. No more food falling through the grates. I've cooked shrimp and vegetables using this, and it works great. Plus just throw it in the dishwasher - so easy.
customer_reviews.author: JHa

customer_reviews.title: Great for Veggies
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Can add some crispiness to veggies. Works much better than other baskets. Other baskets that have wider holes and thinner metal do not crisp as well. No handle, so you must use a pot holder to get it off the grill.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Everything A OK. Soak in soapy water and cleans up fine. More importantly is the veggies. Nice and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: H2o

customer_reviews.title: love, love this basket
customer_reviews.text: nice and heavy duty; used it on the grill with vegs and potatoes -worked like a charm; very happy to have this -makes grilling out so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is perfect. Great size, large enough to put multiple types of veggies. Small enough that it fits in my Acorn grill. Nice heavy duty material. I especially like the handles on the sides. It makes it an easy transition from grill to kitchen. The shipping was super fast and it was packaged perfectly. I couldn’t be more happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome grilling accessory! I use it almost every time we fire up the smoker. With some veggies I line the basket with foil to keep in the juices and just toss the foil when dinner is over.
customer_reviews.author: Mark and Laura

customer_reviews.title: Covered in disgusting glue
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a steel basket, but these guys found a way to screw it up. Product came with a label glued to the basked with an impossible to remove adhesive. So now I will worry about poisoning myself as I cook my veggies/glue. Why?
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Easy Pickup & Cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to use this over weekend - this is a keeper, literally & figuratively. Did grilled petite carrots & cauliflower & both came out grt w that awesome grill/smokey flavor. The 'handle' edges make it easy to pick up AND most importantly tossed it in the dishwasher for an easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Aussiejen

customer_reviews.title: I've had different grill baskets but none this sturdy. I love
customer_reviews.text: The ease and quality of the product. Tonight I just cut peppers and onions in the basket, put the basket on the grill, closed the lid and in fifteen minutes I had delicious vegetables. I've had different grill baskets but none this sturdy. I love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilled food you don’t want falling thru the grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Veggies grill perfectly in this basket. You can toss in sliced peppers and onion, sliced zucchini and eggplant. Easy to make low carb sides for your next BBQ in this.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: A better veggie basket
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace a Weber veggie basket. I like this one so much better. You even get a warranty! Warm basket before putting items in. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: CBPB

customer_reviews.title: Great Basket, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It grilled up my diced veggies with no problem and was easy to clean. I found the basket to be a touch on the large side but quality is outstanding and couldn't ask for better. Time will tell how it holds up with use but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Giese

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding all food.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sturdiness, the size, the price. Everything. I will put it to good use indoor and outdoor on our gas grill and stove.
customer_reviews.author: LPS

customer_reviews.title: ... little gadget is a must have for those that love the taste of grilled veggies and hate to dig ...
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is a must have for those that love the taste of grilled veggies and hate to dig them out of the bottom of their grill. This basket works beautifully. You can grill just about anything in here. You don't have to worry about size or diameter. Everything stays nice and contained. You definitely have to get one for grilling. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Tasty tasty tasty
customer_reviews.text: Was very tasty. Zucchini onion carrots corn (some of corn fell threw) cook for flavor on charcoal then bring in and cook in pan with oil and what a flavor. Perfect size for grill. Cleaned up pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: Long time on the bbq.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of time to grill to doneness. Much longer than we expected. And thick gloves are necessary for safety in handling the basket.
customer_reviews.author: PEL

customer_reviews.title: Great large grill basket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill basket, nice big size. We are trying to slim down and eating lots of veggies, and this does the trick. Lets us grill large quantities. Easy to clean with a scouring pad.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie O

customer_reviews.title: Great basket for Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Great basket for veggies and other items that would slip through the grill otherwise. Cleans up easily and is strong and large for a good serving of items to grill. Great addition to my grilling products that enhance my ability to provide great grilled food.
customer_reviews.author: waynjer64

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a nice grill basket! It's very sturdy and should hold up for years. My husband was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy grill basket.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different grill baskets over the years. This grill basket is one piece. Just put it on the grill and fill it with your favorite vegetables. The veggies don’t fall out! Easy clean up just put in dishwasher. I used this grill basket while grilling a flat iron steak. They both fit on my Kamado Joe Smoker perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

product_meta.title: Grillaholics Heavy Duty Grill Basket - Large Grilling Basket for More Vegetables - Stainless Steel Grilling Accessories Built to Last - Perfect Vegetable Grill Basket for All Grills and Veggies
feature_bullets: RELAX TO THE SOUND OF YOUR FOOD SIZZLING. Nothing says a good day, like grilling with a beer in your hand, tunes playing, and bringing your friends and family together to enjoy a real American meal.

EXPERIENCE THE WEEKEND ANY DAY OF THE WEEK. Our BBQ tools are designed to make grilling easier so you can fire up your grill after a long day of work, any day of the week. Now you can grill that shrimp, vegetables, and diced meat without FOLG (Fear Of Losing to Grill)!

ONLY FOR THE TRUE GRILLAHOLICS. Let’s be honest…everything tastes better on the grill. A true Grillaholic knows that that smokey delicious flavor makes any meal. Grill what you otherwise couldn’t with our stainless steel grill basket and get that coveted smokey flavor.

MAN DISCOVERED FIRE, GRILLAHOLICS MASTERED ITS USE. Grilling is an art. And when you’ve mastered that art…your friends double in numbers. Just like a sculptor needs his chisel, a true Grillaholic needs a vegetable grill basket. The perfect companion for your Weber, Traeger, or Big Green Egg grill.

EXPERIENCE THE GRILLAHOLICS PROMISE. You are making a very wise decision doing business with our company. We know a TRUE Grillaholic like you deserves only the best, which is why we back our grill accessories with a LIFETIME money back guarantee. Add your grill basket to your cart and experience the Grillaholics 5-star customer experience! Consider getting two, one for you and one for your very best friend.
